title: FPS Drops
body:
My fps runs at 60 usually at the start of the game, but sometimes just randomly my fps drops down to 15-20fps and hovers there. During team fights my fps drops down to around 10. These are my spes:

Operating System: Windows 8.1 64-bit (6.3, Build 9600) (9600.winblue_ltsb.160328-1315)
           Language: English (Regional Setting: English)
System Manufacturer: TOSHIBA
       System Model: Satellite S50t-B
               BIOS: 1.40
          Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-4500U CPU @ 1.80GHz (4 CPUs), ~2.4GHz
             Memory: 8192MB RAM
Available OS Memory: 8112MB RAM
          Page File: 2319MB used, 7073MB available
      
Is my processor too slow?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try running through the [Low FPS Troubleshooting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) support article for me.

Let me know if anything helps.
I tried doing the readily available stuff from that support article and it hasn't helped. The thing that confuses me is that when I first got the laptop it was running on medium settings smoothly.
It could be that there's just too much happening on the screen at one time that is causing your FPS drops, you mentioned it only occurs occasionally.
Yes I assumed that was the case, I just thought the laptop I bought was sufficient in running league :/
I'm sorry if i'm really clunky, i've never used this discussion board before.
